data.content:
noun
plural -roads
[count] a place where two or more roads cross
Traffic was stopped at the crossroad. - often plural in form
They arrived at a crossroads marked by a signpost. - often used figuratively to refer to a place or time at which a decision must be made
The industry is at a critical crossroad.
We've reached a crossroads [=turning point] in our relationship.
a road that crosses a main road or that runs across land between main roads
We turned onto a crossroad.
